title: Stir-fried purple sprouting broccoli
description: A vegetarian recipe that packs a punch. This intensely zingy stir-fry works as well at a dinner party as it does as a midweek supper.
ingredients: 1 kilo purple sprouting broccoli, trimmed as for the pasta recipe
Juice of 1 lime and 1/2 its grated zest

method.Step 1: Heat the oil in a wok and when nice and hot throw in the garlic, chili and ginger. Fry, stirring, for about 30 seconds before adding the broccoli and the red onion. Stir and fry for another 30 seconds before adding the lime juice and zest. A minute or so later add the soy sauce and the honey.
